Name: New Lands 2 Collector's Edition
About the game: See what it’s like to be a farmer and maker of sweet treats. Grow cocoa trees, build mills and make squirrel houses. Decorate your own farmhouse. The farther you go into the new lands, the more varied your tasks will be and the harder they’ll be to complete. Work your new lands and become the best maker of sweet treats around in new time management game New Lands 2 Collector's Edition! - zones with colorful landscapes - a happy story - a variety of tasks - incredible achievements - exciting gameplay - gorgeous graphics - calming music - completion guide
